name: shadera-monorepo
description: A VS Code extension for viewing and editing shaders with Electron desktop app

scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.build:extension: npm run build:types && npm run build -w extension
scripts.build:ui: npm run build:types && npm run build -w ui
scripts.build:config-ui: npm run build:types && npm run build -w config-ui
scripts.clean: rimraf extension/node_modules extension/dist extension/out ui/node_modules ui/dist config-ui/node_modules config-ui/dist electron/node_modules electron/dist electron/out types/node_modules types/dist
